item.description: 简易部署hugo文章到github page. 参考： https://gohugo.io/hosting-and-deployment/hosting-on-github/ 使用如下脚本创建deploy.sh. #!/bin/bash echo -e "\033[0;32mDeploying updates to GitHub...\033[0m" # Build the project. hugo -t even # if using a theme, replace with `hugo -t <YOURTHEME>` # Go To Public folder cd

item.title: Create a Blog by Hugo (1)
item.description: 简单记录下如何使用Hugo如何建立Github Page。 参考： * https://github.com/olOwOlo/hugo-theme-even * https://gohugo.io/hosting-and-deployment/hosting-on-github/ 下一篇再补充git hook和与mweb集成，加快发布。 $ brew install hugo $ hugo new site
